Description:
What do we provide?BASIC SALARY + COMMISSION : Permanent opportunity
Own Marketing team for generating fresh leads every day
Modern office located in Business Bay
Incentives & Bonuses
Access to lead generation system and exposure on all property portals
Ensure that company standards, protocols and procedures are well implemented to the Sales ConsultantSkills
Skills:
2 years of Real Estate agent experience preferred
FEMALES ( Preferred and are encouraged to apply)
German, French & Russian language speakers preferred
Candidates experienced in Dubai Real Estate market preferred.
Strong communication skills.
Facilitate negotiations between buyers and sellers.

Should have innovative marketing skills and capable of handling multiple marketing channels.
Should have SALES experience with DUBAI OFFPLAN UNITS
Must be aware of Market strategies and mandatory paperwork
Pleasant and trustworthy
Good, friendly work culture
Generous commission pay structure with unlimited earning potential
Excellent to embark on your real estate career
Residency as per UAE law

Preferred.Nationality: All Eastern European Countries; All Western European Countries; France; Germany; Russian Federation; United Kingdom
